mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AGC_DTL (AGC_ID, BIZ_NUM, EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, BASE_ADDR, DTL_ADDR, TEL, CEO) VALUES (#{agcId}, #{bizNum}, #{email}, #{zipCode}, #{baseAddr}, #{dtlAddr}, #{tel}, #{ceo})
mapper.select: SELECT AGC_ID, BIZ_NUM, EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, BASE_ADDR, DTL_ADDR, TEL, CEO FROM AGC_DTL WHERE AGC_ID = #{agcId}
